import React from 'react' import { Link, Navigate } from 'react-router-dom' import { useState } from 'react' const RegisterPage = () => { const [city, setCity] = useState() const [username, setUsername] = useState('') const [password, setPassword] = useState('') const [repassword, setRepassword] = useState('') const [redirect, setRedirect] = useState(false) const register = (e) => { e.preventDefault() setUsername('') setPassword('') setRedirect(true) } if (redirect) { } return (
register(e)}>

Register

setCity(e.target.value)}>

setRepassword(e.target.value)}>

) } export default RegisterPage
